summary: Director Jonas Mekas provides an intimate glimpse of his personal life by constructing a feature length narrative from over 30 years of private home movie footage.
cast: Jonas Mekas|Jane Brakhage|Stan Brakhage|Robert Breer|Hollis Frampton|Allen Ginsberg|Ken Jacobs|Peter Kubelka|Adolfas Mekas|Oona Mekas|Sebastian Mekas|Hermann Nitsch|Nam June Paik|P. Adams Sitney|Andy Warhol
title: As I Was Moving Ahead Occasionally I Saw Brief Glimpses of Beauty
